name: Stir Fried Water Spinach
ingredients: Water Spinach, Salt, Sugar, Oyster Sauce, Garlic
instructions: Mince garlic. Trim the stems and wash the spinach. Infuse oil with garlic. Stir fry spinach with salt, sugar, and oyster sauce

name: Stir Fried Cauliflower
ingredients: Cauliflower, Scallion, Salt, Sugar, Oyster Sauce
instructions: Chop cauliflower into florets and rinse. Infuse oil with scallion. Put cauliflower in and add salt, sugar, oyster sauce, and cold water. Stir until soft. Optionally cook with {Bacon} bits

name: Cauliflower with Eggs
ingredients: Cauliflower, Eggs, Salt, Sugar, Oyster Sauce
instructions: Prepare beaten eggs with salt. Chop cauliflower into florets and rinse. Put cauliflower in oil and add salt, sugar, oyster sauce, and cold water. Stir until soft. Spread the cauliflower out and drizzle with eggs. Flip when eggs are set

name: Stir Fried Broccoli
ingredients: Broccoli, Garlic, Soy Sauce, Oyster Sauce, Salt, Corn Starch
instructions: Mince garlic. Chop broccoli into florets and boil briefly. Infuse oil with minced garlic. Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, salt, and cornstarch. Add broccoli and stir
